jump_scares.spoiler: A sudden alarm ring startles Berman
As Tommy walks into a room, Alice jumps out at him as a joke
Cindy is grabbed on the shoulder while looking into the caves with a flashlight
As Cindy walks through the darkness, Alice says “Boo!” and startles her with a sound cue
Jeremy looks up and sees Tommy standing right in front of him
Alice looks up and with a sound cue, sees Sarah Fier standing in front of her
Alice shines the flashlight on an eyeless corpse standing up
Ziggy is suddenly grabbed on the shoulder by some Sunnyvalers
A silhouette walks by in the foreground with a sound cue
Becky walks into a room and sees Tommy standing on the side of the door
The campers light a match and it reveals Tommy standing in front of them
Gary grabs Ziggy on the shoulder
There is a sudden bang on the door
Ziggy is grabbed on the head by Tommy and dragged up
An alarm suddenly rings, starling Deena and Josh
